comments:
I did the following to install:
1. extracted com.example.autorefresh_2.0.0_20020919.zip
2. installed autorefresh, autorefresh.ui
3. installed com.example.autorefresh.win32_2.0.0_20021007.zip

Got the following in the log:

*** Bug 24537 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

It is hard to reproduce this bug, but data from other cases like this show that
the problem is that I compiled the jars with 1.4 class libraries.
Fix will be released in next version.
